definition: to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang

sentences.english: I long for family, because family is the best haven.
sentences.chinese: 我戀家，因爲家是最好的避風港。

sentences.english: In this context, porn is a safe haven for male sexual anxieties.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，不雅物是性焦慮男性的避風港。

sentences.english: US Treasuries are the safe haven.
sentences.chinese: 美國國債是安全的避風港。

sentences.english: But these new megacities are havens for religious revivals.
sentences.chinese: 但這些大都市卻是宗教復興的避風港。

sentences.english: The gigantic natural harbour of Poole is a haven for boats.
sentences.chinese: 巨型天然港普爾港是船隻的避風港。

sentences.english: Can high-yielding equities suddenly be a safe haven?
sentences.chinese: 高收益股票能否突然成爲一個避風港？

sentences.english: Port regulation can not make afore -mentioned absoluteness video upload behavior lawful.
sentences.chinese: 避風港規則並不能使上述無限制的視頻上傳行爲合法。

sentences.english: Your relationship should be a haven from the storms of life.
sentences.chinese: 你們的關係將從生命的暴風雨抵達避風港。

sentences.english: Home is your alcazar and safe harbor.
sentences.chinese: 家就是你的城堡和避風港。

sentences.english: But Mr. K’s classroom was a haven.
sentences.chinese: 然而，科先生的課堂卻是避風港。

sentences.english: The world is screaming for safe havens.
sentences.chinese: 世界在迫切地尋找安全避風港。

sentences.english: Even gold was a safe haven no more as prices fell.
sentences.chinese: 就連黃金價格也出現下跌，不再是安全避風港。

sentences.english: Home is the warmest place in the world. Home is the harbor.
sentences.chinese: 確實如此，家是世界上最溫暖的地方，家是避風港。

sentences.english: A massive amount of gray income is seeking safe haven.
sentences.chinese: 大量灰色收入在尋找安全的避風港。

sentences.english: South-East Asian countries in particular harbour many influenza viruses.
sentences.chinese: 特別是非洲東南部國家爲許多流感病毒提供了避風港。

sentences.english: But the beachgrass provides excellent cover.
sentences.chinese: 但是喜沙草屬爲它們提供了很好的避風港。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: stumbling block/obstacle/someone who gets in your way
in an instant a myriad changes (idiom); rapid substantial change
to rely on/to be dependent on
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
extremely rare (idiom)/once in a blue moon
variant of 動蕩|动荡[dong4 dang4]
